#summary How to install VLC Media Player

= Introduction =

This extension uses VLC Webplugin (a.k.a. Mozilla Plugin), which comes with VLC Media Player. This is a tutorial on installing VLC Media Player along with the Mozilla Plugin.

= Windows =

Go to the Videolan.org website and download the package: [http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ Download] <br>
Open and follow the instructions. Choose to install the Mozilla Plugin during the installation. 

= Debian GNU/Linux =

# apt-get install vlc libdvdcss2 <br>
# apt-get update <br>
# apt-get install mozilla-plugin-vlc
